description: Verify that the Login page loads correctly when accessing the /auth/login URL
scenario: User navigates to the login page to access the agent portal
expected_results: Display the complete login page with cybersecurity-themed design, form fields, and security elements
procedure:
1. Open web browser
2. Navigate to http://localhost:5000/auth/login
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check page title displays 'Agent Portal Access'
5. Verify all login form elements are visible and properly styled

description: Verify proper error handling for invalid login credentials
scenario: User attempts login with incorrect username/email or password
expected_results: Display error message with remaining attempts counter and record failed login attempt
procedure:
1. Navigate to /auth/login page
2. Enter invalid username or email
3. Enter any password
4. Click 'Access Portal' button
5. Verify error message 'Invalid username/email or password'
6. Check remaining attempts counter is displayed
7. Verify failed attempt is recorded in database
8. Test with valid username but wrong password
9. Check error message consistency
10. Verify no sensitive information is leaked in error messages

description: Verify login form input fields display correctly with cybersecurity styling
scenario: User views and interacts with username/email and password input fields
expected_results: Display properly styled input fields with agent-themed labels, focus effects, and validation
procedure:
1. Navigate to /auth/login page
2. Verify 'Agent Username or Email' field with person-badge icon
3. Check blue color scheme for username field (text-blue-600 dark:text-blue-400)
4. Verify 'Agent Password' field with key icon
5. Check purple color scheme for password field (text-purple-600 dark:text-purple-400)
6. Test focus effects (focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 and focus:ring-purple-500)
7. Verify placeholder text and hover effects
8. Test field styling in dark mode

description: Verify login page integration with other system components
scenario: User login process integrates correctly with authentication system, database, and other modules
expected_results: Seamless integration with user management, email verification, password reset, and security systems
procedure:
1. Test login integration with user registration system
2. Verify login works with email verification workflow
3. Check integration with password reset functionality
4. Test login attempt tracking and IP lockout systems
5. Verify session management integration
6. Check integration with admin user roles
7. Test login redirects work with protected routes
8. Verify integration with hCaptcha service
9. Check database transaction handling
10. Test error handling integration across components

description: Verify the agent portal header displays correctly with cybersecurity theme
scenario: User views the login page header with gradient background and security styling
expected_results: Display 'Agent Portal Access' title with shield-lock icon and cybersecurity-themed gradient design
procedure:
1. Navigate to /auth/login page
2. Verify gradient background from blue to purple (from-blue-50 via-indigo-100 to-purple-100)
3. Check shield-lock icon (bi-shield-lock) is displayed in blue-cyan gradient circle
4. Verify 'Agent Portal Access' title with gradient text effect
5. Check subtitle 'Enter your credentials to continue mission'
6. Verify animated background elements are present
7. Test dark mode compatibility with gradient adjustments
